channel.title: CVE Feed for Trellix -- Trellix EPO
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trellix -- Trellix EPO

item.title: CVE-2023-3946|2024-08-02T07:08:50.677Z -- trellix -- trellix%20epo
item.description: A reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ePO prior to 5.10 SP1 Update 1allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to potentially obtain access to an ePO administrator's session by convincing the authenticated ePO administrator to click on a carefully crafted link. This would lead to limited access to sensitive information and limited ability to alter some information in ePO.
